author: Taegan Goddard
title: Obama Approval Back Over 50 Percent
text:
Obama Approval Back Over 50 Percent October 19, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
A new Washington Post-ABC News poll finds President Obama’s job approval rating at 51%, while 45% disapprove. 
“Although tepidly positive, those are Obama’s best numbers since May 2013… The movement in his ratings — which we would emphasize has not yet been verified in other public polls — has been slight on a month-to-month basis. But his ratings have moved in a positive direction in two consecutive Post -ABC surveys.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
